reviewText: My dress came in and I ordered a large. It fit very nicely and around the breast it was perfect because of the tightness. I am 135lbs, athletic build, 5' 2", and 38-28-39 measurements. The large fit tight the way it was supposed to around the breast but on my waist it would be better if it was like a medium. I can't get the medium because my boobs won't fit in. I still would need to wear a body shaper to smooth out my tummy and hip area because with the white dress I got I can still see my underwear, belly ring and small pooch from having a baby. I am in great shape but white is not forgiving. I love my dress but as I said I still am going to need a body shaper. No doubt I would order another dress from them though. Just wish there was more room in the boob area so I can order a medium. Make sure you read everyone's reviews and the size charts and figure out what size you really need because shipping for a return on this dress costs the same as buying a dress.
summary: Tight on the boobs but beautiful dress.

I'm going to go have it altered a little today because it did kinda mash my hips in a little more than I wanted. I love my super extreme Betty Boop figure (38-28-48). I'm 5'9 and 195lbs and the large fit fine. (You will have a sexier walk) I'm not sure anyone this size can wear it though. My weight is a lot of hips, butt, thighs, and boob and my waist is super small in comparison to hips so stuff like this usually is what I search for. Don't worry about any cellulite. you definitely won't be able to see it.

reviewText:
For the price, these are really good.  They seem to be polarized as stated and they definitely reduce glare.  However, they are a bit snug, even though I have a smaller head than most people (a snug fit can be good since they won't fall off as easily, but time will tell if they are comfortable for longer periods of time).  So far I've only worn them for about 20 mins at a time, and they are fine for that amount of time.  I haven't had them long enough to determine if they are comfortable for longer than that yet.

22 Jun 2016:  For the price, these are still good, but I would NOT recommend wearing for very long.  These eventually dig into your head and leave dimples.  It definitely is uncomfortable over time!  For brief use, they are fine, so it just depends on how long you plan to wear these.  For me, I usually use them on the drive home or to work.
summary: So far, so good!  A snug fit to keep them falling off your head, and seems to reduce glare just fine.

Some bands don't include the actual watch band lugs forcing the user to purchase them separately.

HESHE you've done it again! I left a review for my first HESHE bag, in which I gave 5 stars & I thought that experience couldn't be repeated. But boy was I wrong! Today in the mail my second HESHE order arrived. This gorg baby of a bag took my breath away. HESHE you've done it again! Supple leather, rich color, cool pockets placement inside & plenty of room. Can't wait to show it off. HESHE you've made this purse girl very happy. I'm already thinking of my next HESHE order.....
Bought as a gift and my wife (who is quite picky) loves it.
Even nicer than expected...........

I'm always looking for the perfect purse. I love this handbag, it's exactly what I was looking for. I don't care for deep purses because everything gets lost in the bottom. This purse is shallow (my preference), but plenty of room for everything I carry. It has a variety of pockets (one of them is a zippered pocketed). I only carry crossbody handbags, so I cut the short handles off of this purse, just for my own convenience. It's a very fashionable, well-made purse. The leather appears to be high quality, the same quality as a D&B purse I bought a couple of years ago.
Here's what I'm able to fit into this purse:
Two long billfolds
Lotion
Makeup (I carry a lot of makeup with me)
antibacterial gel
cellphone
ink pens
prescription pill bottle
a 6.5 oz bottle of water
change
keys
and probably a couple of things I've forgotten to list.
It's very roomy.

This is a cute and classy purse I have, It has a compartment for my phone and make up, it has plenty of zippered pocket to keep valuables, I can wear it on my shoulders or my arms, its really elegant. The leather is soft and I can just squeeze it under my desk drawers, nicely made elegant for the price....love it!!!
This genuine leather casual is very lovely. Thank U, Georgeta

It's a very well made bag BUT it's more an orangey brown color than the picture, and since the bottom is 5" or so wide, and the sides aren't reinforced, the bag sort of hangs over the bottom (unless the bag is full, of course).  Thanks to Amazon Prime and the US office of HOBO, I returned the bag for full refund.  The bag was shipped from China wrapped only in tissue within a plastic-type outer bag, so I was surprised and relieved that it arrived unharmed!  But tht's how unstructured the bag leather is, ao it worked!

I try NOT to buy anything made in China, although I do occasionally only if I'm in dire straights, so to GET an item made AND shipped from there not only takes much longer but adds insult to injury with all the Chinese writing on the outside (I do try to buy American!)
I have bought a HOBO wallet which came from HOBO in the US (and no doubt made in China, alas), and it too is well made, and I love it.  Beware the time delay if you order their items from China.
Cheap material!

reviewText:
This item was sponsored to me by Bundle Monster in exchange for my honest review.

I don't have to dress nice all that often, but when I do, it's nice to have a little bit of nerd culture to add to my outfit to stand out from the crowd a bit.  I got the technologic pack which is great, because the alien heads and QR codes are my favorite out of all of the packs.  While these have a cheap price, they don't look or feel cheap.  They have a nice weight to them, the detail is well done in the designs and they feel plenty sturdy.  This is the kind of item that makes me question why someone would spend $50 and up on cufflinks, but to each their own.

If you are someone who has to dress up every day or just once and a while, these are some great items to help you stand out from the crowd and they are made with quality in mind, as well.  You can't go wrong with these.
summary: A great way to stand out from the crowd.

I have no idea where their picture came from but it's nothing close to that.  Lace is cheap if you even want to be nice enough to call it lace. Trying to return the product has been horrible!  I sent it back May5th 2015, to China using the printing label supplied on the web site. As of today July 8th, 2015 no refund.  Even though I bought it under the prime so I felt it was a safe secure purchase. I wrote to the seller who said he would pay $80- $120 of the shipping cost, but once I shipped it, he then rejiggered on his offer.  Is that even legal?  The cost to ship this to China was ridiculous!  I highly advise you to steer very clear of this product!  To make matters worse I paid $86 to mail it back to China and the guy gave me a bogus address.

I've ordered "cheap" jewelry online from Amazon for a few years and have ordered several dozen pieces. I enjoy shopping for jewelry - especially when I can get pieces for under $3. I got this necklace when it was only 99 cents. I've gotten other necklaces even cheaper. Still, those pieces got a much better rating than this did. I was extremely excited when I got it. Not as shiny as in the picture but it was still beautiful and did not look like something for less than a dollar. In fact, it could have easily passed for a necklace well over $20. And I know with cheap jewelry you MUST always put on a clear coat of nail polish (will post about that at the end of this review so please check it out if you buy cheap jewelry often!). Still, this necklace turned dark gold and then close to black in color VERY quickly. It happened where the chain touched the back of my neck. The chain became difficult to move. Very stiff.

I have NEVER given a rating below 4 stars in the multiple years and dozens upon dozens of pieces of "cheap" jewelry I've gotten on Amazon. But this piece does not deserve a good rating. I highly DO NOT recommend this piece. The metal used is extremely cheap and poorly made. After just hours it looked like a piece of garbage. I'm not sure if I should throw it away or put it in a donation box for homeless people/the poor. I wonder if even they would want it in its current condition... Might as well give it a shot and give it to charity just in case.. If they don't want it they can throw it away. Hate to waste it completely.

***** ADVICE ***** With ALL cheap jewelry you get you absolutely must put on a clear coat of nail polish (doesn't have to be expensive; I just use a 99cent bottle) so that the color doesn't fade - so it remains shiny. Also, the clear coat will make sure your skin doesn't turn green. Don't slop it on! You only need a small amount, a regular layer evenly distributed. Don't rush it either. Take your time. Do half the chain, hang it from a table, let it dry, do the other half, etc. I put a clear coat on my jewelry every 6 months to a year depending on how often its worn, if I went swimming with it on, been in the sun all day, etc. Those things make me put it on even more.
summary: Never given a rating this low before....

This version of the Scout Biker helmet is not accurate.  It's slightly oversized for one thing.  Secondly the brow of the visor should have an arc to it, not be straight across.  And the snout juts too far out at the bottom.  The movie props were vacuum-formed ABS plastic whilst this helmet is hand laid fibreglass.  Typically fibreglass helmets lack the crisp edges that the vacuum-formed helmets have.  Others point out that fibreglass helmets are heavier, but with a Biker Scout helmet the extra weight is negligible.  I like the fact that the seller has included a side-by-side photo comparison of their fibreglass helmet with the older out-of-production Don Post/Rubies plastic helmet.  You can see the obvious differences in the size of the helmet, the snout and the visor.  The Don Post helmet has been acknowledged by the 501st Legion community as being movie accurate.  The only knock with the Don Post helmet has been that the plastic was not ABS, but a softer blow-molded vinyl.  This made the helmet more likely to sag under high temperatures.  Buyers complained how the helmet kits were delivered with deformed parts.  If you're looking for even a reasonably accurate faithful reproduction Biker Scout helmet, do you're research. You'll find better options elsewhere.
summary: Many inaccuracies in shape, size and details.

reviewText: I bought this dress for an occasion and have worn it a couple of times after. This is a stunning, flattering and very elegant dress

We received the dress today (10 days ahead of schedule) and it fits absolutely perfect.  Wow.  We are more than impressed with the quality and craftsmanship.  The dress is fully lined, and all the inner seams are nicely covered.  The fabrics used are a very nice quality and there is some weight to the dress, and lots of structure. We have purchased many high-end dresses in the past and this one stacks up as one of the best.  We are very happy and would recommend using this brand again. When we placed the order, they required about 10 measurements of nearly every place on my daughters body, and within a day or two, we received an email confirmation of the measurements, and the request for about five more.  Then, a day later, we received a phone call to verify all the measurements one more time.  Great customer service.  Understanding the seamstress was a tad difficult as she was definitely from China (this is where the dress is made and ships from), but once we got through that curve, she was very professional and helpful.  I wouldn't hesitate from ordering from this brand again in the future.
summary: Loved the craftsmanship and the quality of materials used!

reviewText: When I received the dress the measurements were slightly off which I measured again myself and had a seamstress measure to make sure I was doing it correctly. The bust area had thick padding that made my chest area look squished like something was squishing it from the top and bottom. I also thought the bottom part before it flared out would be more fitting but it wasnt. It's a very pretty design, but didn't fit well for a custom dress.
summary: The bust area had thick padding that made my chest area look squished like something was squishing it from the top and bottom

reviewText: I am very happy with the design of this dress, I have recieved many compliments. The dress arrived promptly, and my experience with sunvary has been very proffessional.

I had the dress custom made for prom and its is extremely elegant. It flows beautifully with the slight train in the back and fits like a glove. I ordered January 24th, and recieved February 10th! Definitely recommend sunvary to anyone. The service was great and the delivery was swift and the dress is perfect.

This dress is beautiful. I love the colors, and while I'm not terribly impressed with the way the overlay and lace is cut, it's very pretty and I would have worn it had it fit. However, I'm not certain why I took the time to measure and then remeasure to make sure I was sending correct measurements, because the dress is at least two sizes too small. I would need to have four inches added almost everywhere to be able to zip it. I realize I'm not a size 4, but I followed other reviewers recommendations to order a larger dress. I contacted the seller when I realized there was no way I was going to be able to wear the dress, and we have gone around and around about my measurements and how I apparently didn't measure the same way. The seller went as far as telling me to be remeasured and provide photos of the measuring. Sorry, but I'm certainly not going to get down to next to nothing and take pictures to send to anyone, let alone someone I don't know! I've repeatedly asked for a return authorization and have yet to hear if this is going to happen. The seller wants to remake the dress and then if it still doesn't fit, she'll work with me. I'm disappointed that the dress doesn't fit, but I'm furious about the runaround. This dress was not inexpensive, and I responded quickly to every request from the seller, but am not getting great customer service.  ANYHOW, moral of the story, this dress runs VERY small - I sized up one size, followed the sellers sizing chart, measured and sent my measurements, and the dress was still way to small.  I'm thinking at least two extra sizes better be considered if you want to take the chance on this dress.
summary: Beautiful dress, but why did I measure???

If you look at the photo with the model, the fabric is carefully pieced to have colorful bands at the bottom of the sleeves and a blue paisley "cap" on the shoulders.  What I received was a jacket with FLOWERS on the sleeves.  Both of the sleeves were cut unevenly.  There was no careful placement of pattern.  The sleeves were different LENGTHS and patterns, making it look off balance.  The jacket was the color of a band-aid.  There was no blue paisley on the shoulder.  It looked like a middle-schooler sewing experiment.  Not at all worth the price paid.  The vendor offered a refund at my shipping expense.  I should have skipped this purchase all together.
summary: Middle-schooler sewing....not even close to the vendor photos.

I have only recently started wearing hats, so I wanted  to try something cheap in case I didn't like it.  Wow!  I never expected anything nearly so nice for under $10.  I am listing it as somewhat large, not as a complaint, but simply so that anyone reading this review can have some idea of how the size runs.  I have a large head for a female, and this hat was loose enough that I would not have wanted to wear it in a strong wind or bend over very far because it didn't feel secure.  HOWEVER, I would far rather have it run a bit large than be too snug.  The largeness can be remedied easly; snugness not so much.  I took a couple of pieces of poster putty and placed them inside the hat between the inner band and the hat itself, and now it fits perfectly and securely.  I believe a person could also glue some non-slip shelf liner in a compatible color to the inner band and achieve stellar results.
summary: Oustanding hat for a very, very low price

reviewText:
I bought one similar to this that was personalized and spent close to $100!! I bought this one for myself as a mothers day gift as i absolutely LOVED all the charms in it. I also loved the bling around the pendant. The chain that comes along with this is not one of those cheap generic ones either. It's cute and different. It's made just as well as the expensive one i bought. This would make a wonderful gift for any girl, lady, women in your life and you can always add different charms!

I received this product at a discount in return for an honest review.
summary: I bought this one for myself as a mothers day gift as i absolutely LOVED all the charms in it

reviewText:
This necklace is very beautiful and I like it very much.  It looks much more expensive than it is.  It is just as beautiful as Origami Owl floating charm necklaces, and it seems to be high quality.  I bought this one for myself from A Touch of Dazzle after buying a different one for a gift for a young girl.  TJe gift I bought looked so nice that I wanted to buy a floating charm necklace from this company for myself as well.  I am very happy with my purchase.

This company is great also.  I accidently broke the chain of the necklace I recieved the second time I wore it.  I contacted the company and let them know that I accidently broke the chain when I was taking the necklace off.  A Touch of Dazzle sent me a new necklace chain replacement right away for free.  They have great customer service!

I was able to purchase this necklace at a discounted price in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.  I have shared my truthful, transparent opinions regarding this beautiful necklace.
summary: This necklace looks much more expensive than it is!

This scarf is not as long as it appears in the picture.  It is also not the color shown in the picture.  The color shown in the picture I would consider to be a "true gold" the color of the scarf is more of a faded/greenish gold.  I'm not returning the scarf as it is not worth the expense since the scarf was $4.99.  The knitting on the scarf is very pretty, that is the reason I am keeping it.  I may never wear it or I may give it as a gift.

reviewText: Let me start out by just saying that I LOVE these leggings! They are thick, cozy, and comfy and almost feel like a second skin! I am 5'2" and was expecting them to be too long but they fit perfect, exactly like the girls in the picture. I love the cute little reindeer designs on them. The only thing I wish was different is that there is no seam up the middle of the front and back area. This tends to make me look like I have a flat bottom. Of course my hubs was the one to point that out! They look adorable with a long shirt or sweater. I can't wait for colder weather to finally make its way to FL so I can see how warm they really are. I did receive these in exchange for an honest opinion and do recommend them.
summary: Adorable Designs, Very Comfy & Cozy Leggings

reviewText: Fits exactly as expected

I love these so much, I might get them for my sister and cousin.  They are thick and warm and the inside is super soft.  I love the print and color.  The sizing is interesting but fits fine.  I feel like they are a little short in length but the waist is a little high -- however, it does not make a difference in how I wear them.  Very happy to have these for the winter.
I love this scarf.. It keeps me very warm. Its very thick.. It also have a lil sparkle and a rich brown color..

The "White 2" version of the scarf, while still cute, was a little unexpected because it differs quite a bit from the given pictures. From the two pictures with the model, it looks like there is lace trim on it. As well, it looks more beige or maybe even a little pink from all the pictures. When it arrived, it looked more snow white than beige and no lace trim. That's alright, but a little unexpected. The scarf is still comfy, warm, and it was at a great price. Scarfs like this usually go for 20 bucks easy where I live, so I'm very pleased overall.
summary: Cute little scarf perfect for winter

reviewText: Stretches enough I can pull it over my ball cap for those early morning cold hours.
I cannot tell the front from the back and they slide down in the back when sitting. Very small.

They run a little small but they are amazingly cozy!  They do have a lined interior that besides being super soft, it is also warm and keeps your legs comfortable.  The problem is that they are short so I have to wear long socks to cover the gap.  I'm 5'6 but I do have somewhat thick thighs.  I would still recommend them to everyone.

Bought this for my girlfriend, and she loves them! Says they're super comfortable and warm on the inside. They fit her just fine, not too big or small. She typically hates the tights with prints, but loves these.
summary: Says they're super comfortable and warm on the inside

Love these! I'm typically a 7.5 in sandals and an 8 in sneakers and boots, so I got these in size 38 EU and they fit me perfectly. The heel height is just right, and I was shocked at how comfortable they were right out of the box. Beautiful shoes. I plan on getting a lot of wear out of them.
Thanks the jacket is great.  Fits very well.  I'm ready for the 8th Series Premier on August 23rd!

These do come to about 4-6 inches above my ankle (I'm 5' 6", size small normally)- so the reviews that they are short are true.  However, the material is AWESOME- warm and fuzzy interior, and the pattern is so, so, sooooooo cute.  Wear these barefoot around the house, or out with a pair of combat boots. You'll look great.  I am absolutely in love.
PS- a size medium would def fit in these.  I'd guess a large too, but will be tight and likely stretching the pattern.

So, my clear search for women's watches led me to this. It was made by a company called Hula Girl, which also led me to believe this was a women's watch. Opened it up and it's huge. Not an in-between unisex size at all. Again, this was listed in women's watches. Especially with a company name like that, the manufacturer should clearly put in their description that this is a men's watch!
summary: This Hula Girl is a man, baby!!!
